thread.title: Netflix Just Released A Teaser Trailer For Its Adaptation Of "13 Reasons Why"
thread.title_full: Netflix Just Released A Teaser Trailer For Its Adaptation Of "13 Reasons Why"

author: Farrah Penn
title: Netflix Just Released A Teaser Trailer For Its Adaptation Of "13 Reasons Why"
text:
The novel follows a boy named Clay who mysteriously receives a box of cassettes in the mail from a girl named Hannah, whose reasons for suicide remain a mystery.
ID: 10400069 3. In the trailer we first see Hannah, who narrates her 13 reasons over the course of the tapes she mails Clay. View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10400193 4. We then get a glimpse of the thoughts of Hannah’s classmates, some who perhaps feel guilty… View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10400206 5. …and others who may be feeling a bit defensive. View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10400216 6. We then see multiple faces that Hannah may or may not have known with these chilling words: Netflix
Netflix
 ID: 10400227 Netflix
Netflix
 ID: 10400232 8. The trailer ends with Hannah’s hard-hitting words spoken through Clay’s cassette player. View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10400185 View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10400188 10. Executive producer, Selena Gomez, shared the teaser to her Instagram calling the series “a passion project I’ve been working on.” Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com ID: 10400110 11. You’ll be able to binge the entire series March 31 on Netflix. View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10400101 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
